content: free video tutorial only knitting pattern for sizes 0-3 3-6 6-12 12-24 months https //seventhsedge etsy com/listing/1774072033 the chunky baby sweater is a sweater for babies and toddlers this classic raglan worked in the round on circular needles top-down with raglan increases this pattern is so customizable depending on your length preferences this pullover should be worn with 6-10 inches/16-25 cm in positive ease at the chest sweater sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months the sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months correspond to a chest measurement of approximately 14 5-16 16-17 5 17 5-19 19-20 5 inches/36-40 40-44 44-48 48-52 cm finished approx measurements after blocking chest circumference 0-3 months - 22 inches/56 cm 3-6 months - 23 5 inches/60 cm 6-12 months - 27 inches/69 cm 12-24 months - 28 5 inches/73 cm gauge swatch blocked 9 stitches x 19 row in garter stitch on the u s 15 10 mm needles = 4x4 inches/10x10 cm suggested needles u s 15 10 mm circular needles and u s 15 10 mm double-pointed needles if the sleeves are will be not worked using the magic loop technique or the necessary needle size to obtain gauge suggested yarn super bulky 5-6 wpi weight yarn acrylic 80 % alpaca 20 % 170g 6 00 oz = 130 yds 119 m 200 250 300 350 g alpaca from k+c was used materials needed scissors stitch markers tapestry needle measurement tape
